pt.ua.dicoogle.sdk.utils

Class TagsStruct

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ua.dicoogle.sdk.utils.TagsStruct

  • public class TagsStruct
extends Object
    Structure to manage all the tags inside Dicoogle. There are three groups. DIM Fields, DICOM Fields and PrivateFields. DIM Fields may either be DICOM or Private. DICOM and Private groups do not overlap An "Other" field is the common designation for fields that do not belong to the DIM.
    Author:
    Luís A. Bastião Silva , Tiago Marques Godinho Refactor
